text.sepaGuaranteePendingMsg: Your order is under verification and we will soon update you with the order status. Please note that this may take upto 24 hours.
text.invoiceGuaranteePendingMsg: Your order is being verified. Once confirmed, we will send you our bank details to which the order amount should be transferred. Please note that this may take up to 24 hours
text.amountTransaferNoteWithDueDate: Please transfer the amount of %s to the following account on or before %s
text.amountTransaferNote: Please transfer the amount of %s to the following account.
text.paymentReferenceNoteAny: Please use any of the following payment references when transferring the amount. This is necessary to match it with your corresponding order
text.paymentReferenceNote: Please use the following payment reference for your money transfer, as only through this way your payment is matched and assigned to the order:
text.paymentError: Payment was not successful. An error occurred
text.multibancoReference: Please use the following payment reference details to pay the amount of %s at a Multibanco ATM or through your internet banking.
text.googleMessage: Your order was successfully processed using Google Pay(%s ****%s)
text.confirmMessage: The transaction has been confirmed on %s
text.faliureMessage: The transaction has been canceled on %s
text.creditMessage: Credit has been successfully received for the TID: %1$s with amount %2$s on %3$s. Please refer PAID order details in our Novalnet Admin Portal for the TID: %4$s
text.instalmentPrepaidMessage: A new instalment transaction has been received for the Transaction ID: %s. The new instalment Transaction ID is %s with the amount  %s  on  %s.
text.chargebackComments: Chargeback executed successfully for the TID: %s amount: %s on %s. The subsequent TID: %s
text.paymentReminder: Payment Reminder %s has been sent to the customer.
text.collectionSubmission: The transaction has been submitted to the collection agency. Collection Reference: %s.
text.dueDateComments: The transaction has been updated with amount %s and due date %s.
text.updateOnholdComments: The transaction status has been changed from pending to on-hold for the TID: %s on %s
text.redirectUpdateComment: Transaction updated successfully for the TID: %s on %s
text.updateComments1: Transaction updated successfully for the TID: %s with the amount %s on %s
text.refundAlreadyExists: Refund has been already initiated for the order
text.instalmentRefundComment: Instalment has been cancelled for the TID: %s on %s & Refund has been initiated with the amount %s.
text.instalmentRemainRefundComment: Instalment has been stopped for the TID: %s on %s .
text.refundComment: Refund has been initiated for the TID: %s with the amount of %s.
text.refundCommentForNewTid: New TID:%s for the refunded amount
text.zeroAmountAlertMsg: This order processed as a zero amount booking
text.bookedComment: Your order has been booked with the amount of %s. Your new TID for the booked amount: %s
text.epcQrCodeDesc: Alternatively, you can use the QR code below for your convenience. Please scan it with your banking app to complete the payment.
text.changePaymentError: Payment method not able to change
text.subscriptionChargeback: The subscription order is cancelled on %s due to the chargeback executed
text.noPaymentMethodErrorMsg: The payment methods supported by the Novalnet Payments are not available. Please change the payment or contact the shop owner for assistance.

description.creditcard: Your credit/debit card will be charged immediately after the order is completed
description.direct_debit_sepa: The amount will be debited from your account by Novalnet
description.guaranteed_direct_debit_sepa: The amount will be debited from your account by Novalnet
description.instalment_direct_debit_sepa: The amount will be debited from your account by Novalnet
description.invoice: You will receive an e-mail with the Novalnet account details to complete the payment
description.guaranteed_invoice: You will receive an e-mail with the Novalnet account details to complete the payment
description.instalment_invoice: You will receive an e-mail with the Novalnet account details to complete the payment
description.prepayment: You will receive an e-mail with the Novalnet account details to complete the payment
description.ideal: You will be redirected to iDEAL. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.eps: You will be redirected to eps. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.paypal: You will be redirected to PayPal. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.przelewy24: You will be redirected to Przelewy24. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.postfinance: You will be redirected to PostFinance. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.postfinance_card: You will be redirected to PostFinance. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.multibanco: On successful checkout, you will receive a payment reference. Using this payment reference, you can either pay in the Multibanco ATM or through your online bank account
description.bancontact: You will be redirected to Bancontact. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.applepay: Amount will be booked from your card after successful authentication
description.googlepay: Amount will be booked from your card after successful authentication
description.trustly: You will be redirected to Trustly. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.alipay: You will be redirected to Alipay. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.wechatpay: You will be redirected to WeChat Pay. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.online_bank_transfer: You will be redirected to banking page. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.direct_debit_ach: Your account will be debited upon the order submission.
description.mbway: After completing your order, a payment request notification will be sent to your mobile device. You can enter the PIN and authorises the payment.
description.blik: You will be redirected to Blik. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed
description.payconiq: Pay securely directly from your bank account.
description.twint: You will be redirected to TWINT. Please don’t close or refresh the browser until the payment is completed.
